having gone through such hardship in

worthy scene from endgame thor travels
back in time to meet his mother frigga
in asgard and what follows is one of the

film but first a little backstory since
the avengers had failed to stop thanos
from retrieving the infinity stones and
carrying out the blip there was little

had destroyed the infinity stones after
the blip which we learned at the

complicated enough so you should
definitely throw time travel into the
blender these details help explain how

the past him and rocket are there to
retrieve the reality stone and if that
isn't heavy enough this happens to be on
the day that friga dies you can
understand the emotional gravity of

that he's from the future but frigga
knows right away and she embraces her
son saying you're not the thor i know it
all are you thor then breaks down about

lecturing him she listens without
judgment she comforts thor by telling

supposed to be but the measure of a hero
is how well they succeed at being who
they are i love you mom
